search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MeisterTask (meistertask.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for MeisterTask is [https://www.meistertask.com/pricing](https://www.meistertask.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
| Key features | Free | Pro | Business | Enterprise |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Tasks![Image 1](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Create as many tasks as you need. Use checklists, comments, time tracking and more.
 | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Notes![Image 2](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Create notes and pages to organize your content.

 | Up to 5 | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Projects![Image 3](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Create projects to organize your different workflows.

 | Up to 3 | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Attachment size![Image 4](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Attach files from your computer or link any file from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, or MindMeister

 | 20 MB per file | 200 MB per file | 200 MB per file | 200 MB per file |
| Version history![Image 5](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Access older versions of your notes and their pages.

 | 7 days | 30 days | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Templates![Image 6](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Use a quick-start Meister template for your projects and notes, or create your own notes templates.

| Mobile and desktop apps![Image 11](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/Info-b222e7872faf441c1f67b819182d9a7d7972ed115fc718efceaf110dfe9f398a.svg)Use MeisterTask on the go with native mobile and desktop applications.

 | ![Image 12](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/check-grey-4fce9dc0abe5192972f32eba8ef06f9688f3eb89a5d653247d8d80fef58f1c41.svg) | ![Image 13](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/check-grey-4fce9dc0abe5192972f32eba8ef06f9688f3eb89a5d653247d8d80fef58f1c41.svg) | ![Image 14](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/check-grey-4fce9dc0abe5192972f32eba8ef06f9688f3eb89a5d653247d8d80fef58f1c41.svg) | ![Image 15](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/check-grey-4fce9dc0abe5192972f32eba8ef06f9688f3eb89a5d653247d8d80fef58f1c41.svg) |

![Image 169](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/help-1322b5bc70af9f043403b6702fefd46bc6c932dbcb4caa69b0ffbb78d6e217aa.svg)

#### What payment methods do you accept?

Meister currently accepts payment via card or PayPal. You can change your payment method at any time in the Billing section of your account.

![Image 170](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/help-1322b5bc70af9f043403b6702fefd46bc6c932dbcb4caa69b0ffbb78d6e217aa.svg)

#### As a Business user, am I allowed to collaborate with free users?

Yes, collaboration between free and paid accounts is permitted.

![Image 171](https://accounts.meister.co/assets/denarius/meisterlabs/icons/help-1322b5bc70af9f043403b6702fefd46bc6c932dbcb4caa69b0ffbb78d6e217aa.svg)

#### Do you offer a discount for universities and students?

Yes! If you're a student, educator or institution, you can pay less with our [academic and NGO plans](https://support.meistertask.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015778160-How-Do-I-Claim-an-Educational-Discount).

Discover MeisterTask pricing plans. Maximize your team's efficiency with tailored work management solutions.
